PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1992-14871992-07-070COM,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Communications of VICTOR POST, of St. Albert, Alberta, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the NATIONAL GALLERY OF CANADA to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Con Boland, whose term has expired.
Attachments
